subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Clayton Kershaw, the Dodgers’ ace and 3-time Cy Young Award winner, had never given up a home run to a pitcher until Thursday’s 415-foot shot to left field by the Giants’ Madison Bumgarner.
snippet: Clayton Kershaw, the Dodgers’ ace and 3-time Cy Young Award winner, had never given up a home run to a pitcher until Thursday’s 415-foot shot to left field by the Giants’ Madison Bumgarner.
